feed.title: SignalMind Lab
feed.subtitle: SignalMind Lab is an interdisciplinary research laboratory at the intersection of AI/ML, neuroscience, signal processing, and data analytics. We advance scientific understanding through collaborative research partnerships with academic institutions worldwide.

entry.title: New Publication: Thyroid Cancer Recurrence Prediction

link.title: New Publication: Thyroid Cancer Recurrence Prediction

entry.content:
We’re excited to announce our latest research has been accepted for publication in BioData Mining, a journal ranked in the top 6% of its subject area!

Paper Details

Title: CatBoost with physics-based metaheuristics for thyroid cancer recurrence prediction

Journal: BioData Mining
entry.summary: We’re excited to announce our latest research has been accepted for publication in BioData Mining, a journal ranked in the top 6% of its subject area!
